# syncthing_device (Data Source)

Syncthing device ID data source



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cert_pem` (String) PEM-encoded certificate
- `private_key_pem` (String) PEM formatted string to use as the private key

- `id` (String) Device ID
